name: Covidrun (Daveeola)
description:
Name of Game:  Covidrun

Name of Team members:

Ewere Ekpenisi-Igumbor - Lead Environment Artist/Level designer

David Olamide - gamplay designer/programmer, UI/UX

Akinloluwa Akinyemi - 3D artist 

Falade Temitope - 3D animator 

Game Engine Used:  Unreal Engine

Platform Available on: Windows

Brief Description of game: Get in the race, you cant afford to be beaten, avoid every fatal enemy, especially the covid virus, there's always a REWARD
